@EMCDDA The recovery program is very similar to mountain climbers, by us being attached to each other we learn new coping skills, what is safe and healthy. A sponsor helps people make much healthier choices. How to cope  in healthy ways, no more needing to escape feelings and emotions.

@EMCDDA The recovery program works for people who want to be healthy and to heal from the pains of our past. Every pain in my life not healed or resolved causing fears in me that I do or did not understand.

@EMCDDA In our recovery we find a way of living a full productive healthy life with no need to escape our feelings and emotions. Recovery is a healing process. We in our therapies see and feel our self in other people. Recovery and healing is a spiritual healing process.

@EMCDDA Recovery is about healing, through therapies we are able to stop trying to escape through our Addictions and obsessions indicate people are emotionally vulnerable, to understand that Addictions and obsessions are unhealthy
Addictions and obsessions are self abusing our selves.

@EMCDDA People feel vulnerable and as soon as they are able to heal then through therapies they find a healthy lives. Understanding peoples Emotional triggers is important, pains not healed, fears not faced, frustrations due to unreasonable expectations, loneliness, and our boredom
@EMCDDA One can question if giving places to escape is healthy or just make things harder for people to recover.

@EMCDDA Addictions obsessions are the symptoms that people feel vulnerable and are not able to heal from the pains of their past. Understanding Emotional triggers is important, pains not healed, fears not faced, frustrations due to unreasonable expectations, loneliness, and our boredom
